introductionText: The Grand Lancer (2017) stands as one of the notable entries in the mid-size sedan category. Designed by the renowned Italian design house Pininfarina, its exterior boasts clean, sharp lines that blend elegance with a dynamic presence, showcasing a distinct European flair. Equipped with a 1.8L MIVEC engine and a CVT transmission, it offers a smooth and refined driving experience. Although production has ended, it remains a timeless favorite among drivers who value both design and practicality.
